frame.name: Heat_potential
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Insulator</fen> is judged for its potential to increase the body temperature of an <fen>Experiencer</fen>. The <fen>Activity</fen> that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> engages in to experience the heat and the <fen>Circumstances</fen> in which the <fen>Insulator</fen> is judged may also be provided.
<ex>That looks like a <fex name="Degree">really</fex> <t>warm</t> <fex name="Insulator">bed</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Insulator">This blanket</fex> is too <t>toasty</t> <fex name="Experiencer">for me</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Insulator
FE.definition:
<def-root>The object which provides warm. It does not have to radiate heat; it may provide warmth with heavy insulation.
<ex>That is a <t>warm</t> <fex name="Insulator">bed</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Activity</fen> the <fen>Experiencer</fen> engages in to feel heat.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>The state of the world when the Experiencer feels warmth</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The Degree to which the Experiencer feels a level of heat.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: warm.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: able to keep the user at a comfortable level of body heat

lexUnit.name: toasty.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: able to keep very warm
